sense.name: personally represent in physical (bodily) form
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[agent[animate]] EMBODY NP2 NOTE: this sense the NP1 representes both a character (in a play) or abstract qualities.
sense.examples: He embodies all that is evil. She will embody Marta in West Side Story. The king embodies the world. LaRouche embodies the 'American System'.

sense.name: give tangible form to something intangible
sense.examples: This painting embodies the sentiments of the Romantic period. His sculpture really embodies his angst.
